results.title: Obesity-induced inflammation exacerbates clonal hematopoiesis
results.text_hl: @CHEMICAL_Nifedipine @CHEMICAL_MESH:D009543 @@@Nifedipine@@@ inhibits exacerbation of @<m>DISEASE_Cyclic_neutropenia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536227 @@@CH@@@ in combination with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@, @CHEMICAL_N_(1_2_3_5_6_7_hexahydro_S_indacen_4_ylcarbamoyl)_4_(2_hydroxy_2_propanyl)_2_furansulfonamide @CHEMICAL_MESH:C000597426 @@@MCC950@@@, and anakinra.

citations.NLM: Pasupuleti SK, Ramdas B, Burns SS, Palam LR, Kanumuri R, Kumar R, Pandhiri TR, Dave UP, Yellapu NK, Zhou X, Zhang C, Sandusky GE, Yu Z, Honigberg MC, Bick AG, Griffin GK, Niroula A, Ebert BL, Paczesny S, Natarajan P, Kapur R. results.title: Phase I study of metformin in combination with carboplatin/paclitaxel chemotherapy in patients with advanced epithelial ovarian cancer
results.text_hl: No DLTs were observed for @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@. Six @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ were treated at the 1000 mg tds @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ dose level.

citations.NLM: Broekman KE, Hof MAJ, Touw DJ, Gietema JA, Nijman HW, Lefrandt JD, Reyners AKL, Jalving M. Phase I study of metformin in combination with carboplatin/paclitaxel chemotherapy in patients with advanced epithelial ovarian cancer Invest New Drugs. 2020 Oct;38(5):1454-1462. PMID: 32146550

results.title: Metformin improves defective hematopoiesis and delays tumor formation in Fanconi anemia mice.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ improves @<m>DISEASE_Cyclic_neutropenia</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C536227 @@@defective hematopoiesis@@@ and delays @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@tumor@@@ formation in @DISEASE_Fanconi_Anemia @DISEASE_MESH:D005199 @@@Fanconi anemia@@@ @SPECIES_10090 @@@mice@@@.

citations.NLM: Zhang QS, Tang W, Deater M, Phan N, Marcogliese AN, Li H, Al-Dhalimy M, Major A, Olson S, Monnat RJ Jr, Grompe M. Metformin improves defective hematopoiesis and delays tumor formation in Fanconi anemia mice. Blood. 2016 Dec 15;128(24):2774-2784. PMID: 27756748
